text: int sumOf ( int * a , int f , int l , int i , int n ) { if ( i >= n ) return f ; return sumOf ( a , f + ( a [ l + i ] > a [ l + i + 1 ] ? a [ l + i ] : a [ l + i + 1 ] ) , ( a [ l + i ] > a [ l + i + 1 ] ? l + i : l + i + 1 ) , i + 1 , n ) ; } int main ( ) { int t , n , s , j = - 1 , * a ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; s = ( n * ( n + 1 ) ) / 2 ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int * ) * s ) ; while ( j ++ < s - 1 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] ) ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sumOf ( a , a [ 0 ] , 0 , 1 , n ) ) ; free ( a ) ; } }
